channel.title: Need help with spawning barrows
channel.description: how can i make it where i can spawn barrows on my server?

item.title: Need help with spawning barrows
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

Zh00b:

Do you know any Java…? if not then find a command that lets you spawn an item, compy the command, change the actual ::whatever then change the items spawned the whatever items you want to spawn. (Item ID not Item Name) You would do this in the file client, if you can’t open it chose to open it in notepad

You like to spam alot, don’t you?

Heres the command:

		if (command.startsWith("barrows"))
	{
		addItem(4716, 1);
		addItem(4718, 1);
		addItem(4720, 1);
		addItem(4722, 1);
		addItem(4708, 1);
		addItem(4710, 1);
		addItem(4712, 1);
		addItem(4714, 1);
		addItem(4753, 1);
		addItem(4755, 1);
		addItem(4757, 1);
		addItem(4759, 1);
		addItem(4745, 1);
		addItem(4747, 1);
		addItem(4749, 1);
		addItem(4751, 1);
		addItem(4732, 1);
		addItem(4734, 1);
		addItem(4736, 1);
		addItem(4738, 1);
		addItem(4726, 1);
		addItem(4728, 1);
		addItem(4730, 1);
		addItem(4724, 1);
	}

Read full topic
